name: 席行正
objective: 本課程以擴散與質傳現象為基礎，教導學生有關吸附現象之原理與應用。透過課程講解及實例研討，對吸附劑製備、吸附劑理化性質分析、吸附平衡與吸附反應動力、以及吸附合併化學反應現象介紹，建立學生對吸附相關知識與其於污染控制相關議題應用有更深入的理解。
schedule:
(1) Fundamentals of Diffusion 
(2) Fundamentals of Mass Transfer 
(3) Manufacture of Adsorbents 
(4) Surface Chemical Structure and Porous Structure of Adsorbents 
(5) Surface Modification of Adsorbents 
(6) Adsorption Isotherms 
(7) Equilibrium Adsorption of Gas Mixtures 
(8) Adsorption Kinetics 
(9) Adsorber Dynamics: Bed Profiles and Breakthrough Curves 
(10) Adsorption coupled with homogeneous and heterogeneous reaction
Final report
Final exam
scorePolicy: Final Report 期末報告(40%)、Final exam 期末測驗(40%)、Class attendance and performance 課堂出席與表現(20%)
materials:
Reference books:
1. Cussler, E. L. Diffusion: Mass Transfer in Fluid Systems, Cambridge University Press, New York, NY, 1996. 
2. Yang, R. T. Adsorbents: Fundamentals and Applications, Wiley-Interscience, NJ, 2003. 
3. Bansal, R. C.; Goyal, M. Activated Carbon Adsorption, Taylor&Francis, FL, 2005.
